titleStmt.title: A serious discourse between two lovers. This song will teach young men to wooe, and shew young maidens what to do; nay it will learn them to be cunning too. To the tune of, When sol will cast no light, or, Deep in love. / By John Wade.
titleStmt.author: Wade, John, fl. 1660-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Ptinted [sic] for P[hilip]. Brooksby at the Golden-Ball in West-Smithfiled [sic].,

notesStmt.note: Date, place of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
